item.title: Fedora Tips
item.description: Change plymouth boot theme. plymouth-set-default-theme your_theme_name_here /usr/libexec/plymouth/plymouth-update-initrd Fix grub2 theme. # /dev/sda grub2-install /dev/sda Change grub2 theme. sed -i.save '/^GRUB_THEME/d' /etc/default/grub echo 'GRUB_THEME="/boot/grub2/themes/system/theme.txt"' >> /etc/default/grub echo 'GRUB_TERMINAL_OUTPUT="gfxterm"' >> /etc/default/grub grub2-mkconfig -o /boot/grub2/grub.cfg fix beep http://forums.gentoo.org/viewtopic-t-738176-start-0.html echo ' modprobe pcspkr chmod u+s /usr/bin/beep ' >> /etc/rc.local chmod a+x /etc/rc.local Move “close” button to the left gsettings set org.gnome.shell.overrides button-layout "close" SSD Tips https://wiki.
